name: Absolute Kill - Elite Sniper Shooter Commando
name_original: Absolute Kill - Elite Sniper Shooter Commando
description:
Get ready for an action packed, adrenaline pumping sniper shooter game where you dropped right into pure chaos!

Featuring 6 chaotic levels of pure action, its up to you to take out all the enemies and come out victorious!

FEATURES

- Six action packed levels!
- Easy tap controls.
- Rocking sound track.
